sentences.sentence: Many area residents are keen bicyclists.
sentences.translation: 许多当地居民都热衷于骑自行车。

sentences.sentence: You can join them, by following Eckberg and his class as they track the adventures of Dan and Steve Buettner, two world-class bicyclists from U.S.A..
sentences.translation: 您可以跟随 Eckberg 和他的班级加入他们的行列，他们跟踪来自美国的两位世界级自行车手丹和史蒂夫·布特尼的冒险经历。

sentences.sentence: Starting last month these two bicyclists, joined by archaeologists and a technical support team, are interacting with students via the Internet, the worldwide computer network.
sentences.translation: 从上个月开始，这两名骑自行车的人，连同考古学家和一个技术支持团队一起，通过互联网，即全球计算机网络，与学生们互动。
